price: Ɛyε Adiyisεm a efri Nea Ɔbͻͻ asaase ne ͻsoro a εkorͻn no hͻ.
arabic: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel
